summary: 20 new warpaints to be mixed and matched!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]Beautiful Freaks - Layered Paints by MM[/b][/size]

 First things first: this is my first time releasing a mod. I will try and support it, respond to questions and comments and perhaps update it when/if I make more paints. I'm not quite skilled enough for requests, but I am still fully willing to listen to requests - I just can't promise anything, sorry. 
 
 

[size=6][b]Description:[/b][/size]
This mod replaces the vanilla warpaints 1-10 with my own paints. They're not designed to be Lore-friendly, so don't worry, I'm well aware that they don't fit with the Nordic look of Skyrim. But if you're looking for creepy warpaint for whatever reason. . Here, I tried! ^^
The warpaints are designed to be layered with one another using RaceMenu, allowing you to mix the colors of each layer and stack them up however you want - letting you make all sorts of designs unique for your characters.
 

 
[size=6][b]Requirements:[/b][/size]
None if you're using the replacer version, however, make sure to use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624/]RaceMenu[/url] if you want the paints to be standalone.
I HIGHLY recommend using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34858/]the SKSE .ini tweak[/url] so your warpaints won't be blocky!
 


[size=6][b]Credits:[/b][/size]
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1159455/?]faeriexdecay[/url][/b] - Original idea and testing
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5925296/?]andreamkall[/url][/b] - Testing
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4369338/?]daMiriam[/url][/b] - Testing and cool suggestions 
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5338605/?]gracescreech[/url][/b] - Testing/Keeping me company
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1260494/?]CrimsonFairy[/url][/b] - Testing/Listening to endless rants
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1924379/]TairenSoul[/url][/b] - Making the standalone update

If I forgot someone please slap me, remind me and forgive me. In that order.
author: MM
